title: Use uploaded photos across the site and update the website icon (favicon)

requirements.text: Add the 12 uploaded images as optimized static assets and place them throughout the existing single-page site to make it more visually attractive (hero + relevant service sections), using responsive layouts (grid/cards) and ensuring images are cropped appropriately for mobile and desktop.

quotes: use these images to make the website more attractive

acceptanceCriteria: All 12 uploaded images are included in the built frontend as static assets (no backend/image fetching).
Hero section includes at least one of the uploaded tractor/music visuals in a prominent way without harming text readability (e.g., overlay/gradient as needed).

Each service section (Music Systems, Modification Materials, Electrical Mechanic Services) displays relevant uploaded imagery in a clean responsive layout (no broken aspect ratios, no overflow on mobile).
All images include English alt text (generic descriptive alt text is OK).
Page performance is maintained by using resized/optimized variants (no full-resolution originals used directly in main layout where unnecessary).

requirements.text: Replace the website icon (favicon) with an enhanced version derived from the user-selected uploaded image (the Beniwal Music Center / Beniwal Music Stereo signboard image), and update the header/footer logo to match the new branding image where appropriate.

quotes: use this complete image as icon by some minor changes to make it attractive do it by yourself

acceptanceCriteria: The HTML head includes favicon links that load the new generated icon assets (e.g., 32x32 favicon + 180x180 apple-touch icon).
Browser tab/favicon updates correctly after rebuild.
Header and footer logo render crisply and consistently with the updated brand icon (no stretching; transparent background if applicable).

requirements.text: After the visual updates are complete, add a clear on-page prompt in the Contact section asking the site owner to provide contact information (phone number, address, and business hours) so the placeholders can be replaced later (English text).

quotes: and after completing this ask me for contact information

acceptanceCriteria: Contact section still shows placeholders for Phone/Address/Business Hours.
A visible English note/callout in the Contact section asks the owner to provide phone, address, and business hours to update the site.

constraints: Frontend must keep using static assets (do not route images through the backend).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the app as a single-page site with the existing sections and navigation; do not introduce checkout/e-commerce.
nonGoals: Adding a backend CMS/admin panel for editing contact info.
Implementing image upload functionality inside the app (images are provided out-of-band).
